attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app gave me a virus and didn’t even let me see the news or anything! It just froze and kept shutting down!

attributes.title: I think I’m good
attributes.review: When i opened it to see that I’ve been hacked and I couldn’t do anything I hate this app

attributes.title: Yeah❤️(no btw)
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app, then realized that there was a huge racist Cheeto man on my screen so I quickly deleted it before it gave me nightmares😻

attributes.title: WORST APP!!
attributes.review: horrible app! Opening up this app to see a racist Cheeto was only the beginning of the horror on this app! One star is too many stars for this app!

attributes.title: Lame ahh app
attributes.review: First thing, I didn’t see Obama in which I adore! Plus, if I wanted to see a Cheeto I’ll rather buy some at the store. This app is a joke, like his rally 😭😂😂.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review:
they rlly flashed Trump’s nude there for like 10 seconds with a text that said VOTE TRUMP while I was just trying to be on the app, I felt SO uncomfortable looking at his tiny privates 

:(

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: the second i opened the app, a loud screeching sound came out of my phone, freaking out my dog and my little sister. quickly after the screeching, i was confronted by a picture so ugly, so horrid, and so disturbing; donald trump. the very sight of him caused my entire family to vomit violently. do not download.

attributes.title: Awful!
attributes.review: This app should be taken off the Apple store because its terrible in general.

attributes.title: Ew.
attributes.review: Imagine supporting an app that supports a racist, sexist, homophobic cheeto lookin 74 year old man who calls white supremecists good people but black lives matter advocates evil people...could never be me 🤢 .

attributes.title: MY EYES
attributes.review: I did not like the app it was terrifying and forcing me to look at a Cheeto all day. I opened and all I saw was 🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠 EVERYWHERE. I will never forget this traumatizing experience. My eyes POV: 👁🔥👄🔥👁. HORRIBLE...ANYONE ELSE 2020
